00061 #include "uip.h"
00062 #include "httpd.h"
00063 #include "httpd-fs.h"
00064 #include "httpd-cgi.h"
00065 #include "http-strings.h"
00066 
00067 #include <string.h>
00068 
00069 #define STATE_WAITING 0
00070 #define STATE_OUTPUT  1
00071 
00072 #define ISO_nl      0x0a
00073 #define ISO_space   0x20
00074 #define ISO_bang    0x21
00075 #define ISO_percent 0x25
00076 #define ISO_period  0x2e
00077 #define ISO_slash   0x2f
00078 #define ISO_colon   0x3a
00079 
00080 
00081 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00082 static unsigned short
00083 generate_part_of_file(void *state)
00084 {
00085   struct httpd_state *s = (struct httpd_state *)state;
00086 
00087   if(s->file.len > uip_mss()) {
00088     s->len = uip_mss();
00089   } else {
00090     s->len = s->file.len;
00091   }
00092   memcpy(uip_appdata, s->file.data, s->len);
00093 
00094   return s->len;
00095 }
00096 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 static
00098 PT_THREAD(send_file(struct httpd_state *s))
00099 {
00100   PSOCK_BEGIN(&s->sout);
00101 
00102   do {
00103     PSOCK_GENERATOR_SEND(&s->sout, generate_part_of_file, s);
00104     s->file.len -= s->len;
00105     s->file.data += s->len;
00106   } while(s->file.len > 0);
00107 
00108   PSOCK_END(&s->sout);
00109 }
00110 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00111 static
00112 PT_THREAD(send_part_of_file(struct httpd_state *s))
00113 {
00114   PSOCK_BEGIN(&s->sout);
00115 
00116   PSOCK_SEND(&s->sout, s->file.data, s->len);
00117 
00118   PSOCK_END(&s->sout);
00119 }
00120 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00121 static void
00122 next_scriptstate(struct httpd_state *s)
00123 {
00124   char *p;
00125   p = strchr(s->scriptptr, ISO_nl) + 1;
00126   s->scriptlen -= (unsigned short)(p - s->scriptptr);
00127   s->scriptptr = p;
00128 }
00129 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00130 static
00131 PT_THREAD(handle_script(struct httpd_state *s))
00132 {
00133   char *ptr;
00134 
00135   PT_BEGIN(&s->scriptpt);
00136 
00137 
00138   while(s->file.len > 0) {
00139 
00140     /* Check if we should start executing a script. */
00141     if(*s->file.data == ISO_percent &&
00142        *(s->file.data + 1) == ISO_bang) {
00143       s->scriptptr = s->file.data + 3;
00144       s->scriptlen = s->file.len - 3;
00145       if(*(s->scriptptr - 1) == ISO_colon) {
00146         httpd_fs_open(s->scriptptr + 1, &s->file);
00147         PT_WAIT_THREAD(&s->scriptpt, send_file(s));
00148       } else {
00149         PT_WAIT_THREAD(&s->scriptpt,
00150                        httpd_cgi(s->scriptptr)(s, s->scriptptr));
00151       }
00152       next_scriptstate(s);
00153 
00154       /* The script is over, so we reset the pointers and continue
00155          sending the rest of the file. */
00156       s->file.data = s->scriptptr;
00157       s->file.len = s->scriptlen;
00158     } else {
00159       /* See if we find the start of script marker in the block of HTML
00160          to be sent. */
00161 
00162       if(s->file.len > uip_mss()) {
00163         s->len = uip_mss();
00164       } else {
00165         s->len = s->file.len;
00166       }
00167 
00168       if(*s->file.data == ISO_percent) {
00169         ptr = strchr(s->file.data + 1, ISO_percent);
00170       } else {
00171         ptr = strchr(s->file.data, ISO_percent);
00172       }
00173       if(ptr != NULL &&
00174          ptr != s->file.data) {
00175         s->len = (int)(ptr - s->file.data);
00176         if(s->len >= uip_mss()) {
00177           s->len = uip_mss();
00178         }
00179       }
00180       PT_WAIT_THREAD(&s->scriptpt, send_part_of_file(s));
00181       s->file.data += s->len;
00182       s->file.len -= s->len;
00183 
00184     }
00185   }
00186 
00187   PT_END(&s->scriptpt);
00188 }
00189 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00190 static
00191 PT_THREAD(send_headers(struct httpd_state *s, const char *statushdr))
00192 {
00193   char *ptr;
00194 
00195   PSOCK_BEGIN(&s->sout);
00196 
00197   PSOCK_SEND_STR(&s->sout, statushdr);
00198 
00199   ptr = strrchr(s->filename, ISO_period);
00200   if(ptr == NULL) {
00201     PSOCK_SEND_STR(&s->sout, http_content_type_binary);
00202   } else if(strncmp(http_html, ptr, 5) == 0 ||
00203             strncmp(http_shtml, ptr, 6) == 0) {
00204     PSOCK_SEND_STR(&s->sout, http_content_type_html);
00205   } else if(strncmp(http_css, ptr, 4) == 0) {
00206     PSOCK_SEND_STR(&s->sout, http_content_type_css);
00207   } else if(strncmp(http_png, ptr, 4) == 0) {
00208     PSOCK_SEND_STR(&s->sout, http_content_type_png);
00209   } else if(strncmp(http_gif, ptr, 4) == 0) {
00210     PSOCK_SEND_STR(&s->sout, http_content_type_gif);
00211   } else if(strncmp(http_jpg, ptr, 4) == 0) {
00212     PSOCK_SEND_STR(&s->sout, http_content_type_jpg);
00213   } else {
00214     PSOCK_SEND_STR(&s->sout, http_content_type_plain);
00215   }
00216   PSOCK_END(&s->sout);
00217 }
00218 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00219 static
00220 PT_THREAD(handle_output(struct httpd_state *s))
00221 {
00222   char *ptr;
00223 
00224   PT_BEGIN(&s->outputpt);
00225 
00226   if(!httpd_fs_open(s->filename, &s->file)) {
00227     httpd_fs_open(http_404_html, &s->file);
00228     strcpy(s->filename, http_404_html);
00229     PT_WAIT_THREAD(&s->outputpt,
00230                    send_headers(s,
00231                    http_header_404));
00232     PT_WAIT_THREAD(&s->outputpt,
00233                    send_file(s));
00234   } else {
00235     PT_WAIT_THREAD(&s->outputpt,
00236                    send_headers(s,
00237                    http_header_200));
00238     ptr = strchr(s->filename, ISO_period);
00239     if(ptr != NULL && strncmp(ptr, http_shtml, 6) == 0) {
00240       PT_INIT(&s->scriptpt);
00241       PT_WAIT_THREAD(&s->outputpt, handle_script(s));
00242     } else {
00243       PT_WAIT_THREAD(&s->outputpt,
00244                      send_file(s));
00245     }
00246   }
00247   PSOCK_CLOSE(&s->sout);
00248   PT_END(&s->outputpt);
00249 }
00250 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00251 static
00252 PT_THREAD(handle_input(struct httpd_state *s))
00253 {
00254   PSOCK_BEGIN(&s->sin);
00255 
00256   PSOCK_READTO(&s->sin, ISO_space);
00257 
00258 
00259   if(strncmp(s->inputbuf, http_get, 4) != 0) {
00260     PSOCK_CLOSE_EXIT(&s->sin);
00261   }
00262   PSOCK_READTO(&s->sin, ISO_space);
00263 
00264   if(s->inputbuf[0] != ISO_slash) {
00265     PSOCK_CLOSE_EXIT(&s->sin);
00266   }
00267 
00268   if(s->inputbuf[1] == ISO_space) {
00269     strncpy(s->filename, http_index_html, sizeof(s->filename));
00270   } else {
00271     s->inputbuf[PSOCK_DATALEN(&s->sin) - 1] = 0;
00272     strncpy(s->filename, &s->inputbuf[0], sizeof(s->filename));
00273   }
00274 
00275   /*  httpd_log_file(uip_conn->ripaddr, s->filename);*/
00276 
00277   s->state = STATE_OUTPUT;
00278 
00279   while(1) {
00280     PSOCK_READTO(&s->sin, ISO_nl);
00281 
00282     if(strncmp(s->inputbuf, http_referer, 8) == 0) {
00283       s->inputbuf[PSOCK_DATALEN(&s->sin) - 2] = 0;
00284       /*      httpd_log(&s->inputbuf[9]);*/
00285     }
00286   }
00287 
00288   PSOCK_END(&s->sin);
00289 }
00290 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00291 static void
00292 handle_connection(struct httpd_state *s)
00293 {
00294   handle_input(s);
00295   if(s->state == STATE_OUTPUT) {
00296     handle_output(s);
00297   }
00298 }
00299 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00300 void
00301 httpd_appcall(void)
00302 {
00303   struct httpd_state *s = (struct httpd_state *)&(uip_conn->appstate);
00304 
00305   if(uip_closed() || uip_aborted() || uip_timedout()) {
00306   } else if(uip_connected()) {
00307     PSOCK_INIT(&s->sin, s->inputbuf, sizeof(s->inputbuf) - 1);
00308     PSOCK_INIT(&s->sout, s->inputbuf, sizeof(s->inputbuf) - 1);
00309     PT_INIT(&s->outputpt);
00310     s->state = STATE_WAITING;
00311     /*    timer_set(&s->timer, CLOCK_SECOND * 100);*/
00312     s->timer = 0;
00313     handle_connection(s);
00314   } else if(s != NULL) {
00315     if(uip_poll()) {
00316       ++s->timer;
00317       if(s->timer >= 20) {
00318         uip_abort();
00319       }
00320     } else {
00321       s->timer = 0;
00322     }
00323     handle_connection(s);
00324   } else {
00325     uip_abort();
00326   }
00327 }
00328 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00335 void
00336 httpd_init(void)
00337 {
00338   uip_listen(HTONS(80));
00339 }
